user.title: Choose Transport Operator
user.description: Select the public transport operator you want to monitor.

data_description.operator: Select either RET for Rotterdam public transport or NS for Dutch Railways

ret.title: Configure RET Stop

data_description.stop_id: The RET stop identifier (e.g., NL:Q:31000539 or just 31000539)
data_description.stop_name: A friendly name for this stop (e.g., Beurs Metro)
data_description.line_filter: Optional: only show specific lines (e.g., 2, 25, E)

ns.title: Configure NS Station

data_description.ns_api_key: Your NS API key from https://apiportal.ns.nl

data_description.station_name: A friendly name for this station
